question.question: Which of the following is not JavaScript Data Types?
In what way is the closure compiler efficient?
question.option1: Increases the size of the JavaScript files
question.option2: Reduces the size of the JavaScript files

question.question: What is the purpose of the advanced mode in the closure compiler?
What does the interpreter do when you reference variables in other scopes?
What does the appendChild() method perform?
question.option1: Appends a node in the middle of the index taken as the parameter
question.option2: Appends a node as the first child
question.option3: Appends a node as the last child
question.option4: Replaces and appends at the last node
